summary: The client shared fragmented Flask app code involving Supabase and login routes, requesting cleanup without manual coding and allowing Supabase removal. Mike analyzed the issues, proposed a new user story US-017 for SQLite migration and app consolidation, and suggested sprint SP-003 for integration, seeking approval to proceed.

decisions.title: Propose new user story for app cleanup
decisions.details: Create US-017 to remove Supabase, migrate to local SQLite, consolidate routes, and enable testable login-to-dashboard flow without cloud dependencies.

decisions.title: Propose new sprint for integration
decisions.details: Define SP-003 including US-017, US-010, and US-001 to achieve a runnable local app with end-to-end testing.

actions.task: Approve or tweak proposed US-017 and SP-003 for execution
Execute sprint SP-003 upon approval, generating cleaned app.py with SQLite integration

risks.risk: Fragmented code with duplicate app definitions and Supabase dependencies causing crashes and integration issues
risks.mitigation: Migrate to local SQLite via US-017, consolidate into single app.py, and test end-to-end flow
